movie_title: New Year in Japan | 初めてのお正月
introduction:
Celebrating my first New Year in Osaka, Japan!
日本移住して記念すべき最初のお正月！

Note: on 1/1/2024, there was a ma
tags: living in japan as a foreigner
国際恋愛 オーストラリア

vocabulary.definition: exceeding what is reasonable or appropriate; excessive or elaborate
vocabulary.example: The dinner party had an extravagant display of decorations and gourmet dishes.

vocabulary.definition: a belief, behavior, or practice passed down within a group or society with symbolic meaning or significance
vocabulary.example: It is a tradition in my family to have a picnic in the park every summer.

vocabulary.definition: strips or strings of dough made from wheat flour, water, and sometimes egg
vocabulary.example: I love slurping hot noodles on a cold winter day.

vocabulary.definition: a place regarded as holy because of its associations with a divinity or a sacred person or relic
vocabulary.example: People visit the shrine to pray for good luck and blessings.

vocabulary.definition: chance or luck as an arbitrary force affecting human affairs
vocabulary.example: She received a fortune cookie with an inspiring message inside.

vocabulary.definition: very intense; so strong as to be irresistible
vocabulary.example: The support from the community was overwhelming after the natural disaster.
